channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Structure Fire - Knockdown; INC#0175; 01:21AM; 175 E 49th St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/45Qtmr2" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/45Qtmr2</a>; #SouthPark; Firefighters responded to a one-story single-family home with fire showing. Crews coordinated interior fire attack efforts with rooftop ventilation to extinguish the flames in 45 minutes (2:06am). The cause of the fire was attributed to a medical equipment malfunction. No reported injuries. The structure is unsafe to reoccupy and Building and Safety will be responding with a Red Tag. The family was issued a SAVE card on scene to help them during this time. Thankfully, no one was injured.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E14 E21 E221 E233 E33 E46 EM13 RA15 RA33 RA846 SQ21 T21 T33; CH7; 12 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#2101; 12:15AM; 8370 N Paso Robles Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3VQPNIb" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3VQPNIb</a>; #Northridge; Firefighters arrived to find large flames burning up into the night sky from a row of Cypress trees, in close proximity to several residential structures. Crews quickly deployed fire hose streams to knock back the flames. Thankfully, the fire was extinguished before any structures became involved. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. ; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC12 BC17 E100 E103 E104 E288 E289 E290 E75 E87 RA100 RA87 RA903 T88 T89 T90; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#2101; 11:57PM; 8370 N Paso Robles Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3VQPNIb" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3VQPNIb</a>; #Northridge; PRELIM: Row of large Cypress trees on fire, threatening nearby residential structures. ; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC12 BC17 E100 E103 E104 E288 E289 E290 E75 E87 RA100 RA87 RA903 T88 T89 T90; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1995; 11:13PM; 18230 W Lull St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/45RkNMF" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/45RkNMF</a>; Reseda; Firefighters arrived to find heavy fire from a detached garage behind a one-story home. Crews quickly extinguished the flames and prevented spread to the home. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC15 BC17 E103 E273 E287 E290 E293 E296 E70 E83 E90 E93 RA70 RA73 RA90 T73 T87 T90 T93 T96; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Tree Fire; INC#1460; 08:43PM; 8309 N Topeka Dr; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3RTxW22" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3RTxW22</a>; #Northridge; *Corrected Address* Firefighters stopped at the corner, connected to the hydrant, and drove to the end of the cul-de-sac where a row of Cypress trees was engulfed with flames and dropping embers on several nearby roofs of homes. Firefighters quickly deployed hose streams to extinguish the flames and prevent the nearby homes from becoming involved. Thankfully, no one was injured and no structures were damaged. Witnesses initially reported illegal fireworks in the area, but the official cause is still under investigation.; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E103 E273 E290 RA903 T73 T90; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange

Tree Fire; INC#1460; 08:25PM; 18900 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4cqF5Pz" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4cqF5Pz</a>; #Northridge; *Address is approximate* Fire crews are on scene of several Cypress trees on fire, threatening nearby homes.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; E273 T73; CH8; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1172; 05:44PM; 14748 W Burbank Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3L9H3Ij" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3L9H3Ij</a>; #ShermanOaks; Firefighters responded to a four-story apartment building (3 residential floors over a parking level) with smoke showing. Firefighters found flames consuming a balcony and burning inside of one unit. Crews quickly extinguished the flames, which appear to have started with a lithium ion battery on the balcony. Hazardous Materials specialists are responding to assist with disposing of the battery. Ultimately, it took 30 firefighters 23 minutes to extinguish the flames (6:07pm). No reported injuries. Crews are continuing to work to evacuate the smoke from the building. Nothing further.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC14 BC9 CM42 E102 E260 E288 E39 E88 E99 EM14 RA102 RA88 T39 T60 T88; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Oil Spill; INC#1804; 10:01PM; 4701 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4cMlaKR" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4cMlaKR</a>; #NorthHollywood; Firefighters (including HazMat Specialists) are on scene of an oil spill (approximately 500 gallons) attempting to redirect and limit the flow to prevent environmental contamination (storm drains). No additional oil spilling is anticipated. No reported injuries.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E221 E76 E86 E87 RA86 SQ21 T21; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1689; 08:50PM; 21700 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3RVKGW5" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3RVKGW5</a>; #CanogaPark; Firefighters battled flames in one upstairs unit of a two-story garden-style apartment building. Crews quickly developed a water supply from a nearby fire hydrant and extended hose lines upstairs to the fire unit. Ultimately, it took the first 32 firefighters 14 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC10 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E106 E107 E290 E296 E305 E72 E84 EM17 RA106 RA96 T105 T90 T96; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1689; 08:36PM; 21700 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3RVKGW5" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3RVKGW5</a>; #CanogaPark; Two-story garden-style apartment with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E107 E296 E305 E72 E84 RA106 RA96 T105 T96; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange
